text: Rathaus Essen () is a 22-storey, skyscraper in Essen, Germany. When completed on 1 July 1979, it was the tallest city hall in Europe, and is currently the tallest city hall in Germany. It has a base floor area of more than . ==References== == External links == * Essen Town Hall and Service Category:City and town halls in Germany Category:Buildings and structures in Essen Category:Government buildings completed in 1979 Category:Modernist architecture in Germany Category:Skyscrapers in Essen Category:Skyscraper office buildings in Germany
title: Essen City Hall
